column1: And so when Rihanna, in the middle of soaking up the sun on her swan float — a required activity for all celebrities — realized that she was losing her balance, her priorities were clear. RiRi gloriously emerged like Aphrodite from the water, wine glass in hand.

This email is sent to someone when a document entry is posted by a member to whom they have subscribed.

[header]

[sender_title] has posted a new document entry: [object_title].
Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
SES - Documents Sharing - Claim Request to Document Owner
This email is sent to the document owner when a member claim their document.
A member has claimed your document.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message using the Claim For Document document:
SES - Documents Sharing - Claim Request to Site Owner
This email is sent to site owners to take action on claim request for document.
A member has claimed a document.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message to take action on the claim request for document:

[message]

[footer]
SES - Documents Sharing - Claim Approval to Document Owner
This email is sent to the document owner when site admin approve the claim request of document.
Site owner has approved your claim request for the document.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message for approval of the claim:

[message]

[footer]
SES - Documents Sharing - Claim Approval to Document Owner
This email is sent to the document owner when site admin approve the claim request of document.
Site owner has approved your claim request for the document.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message for approval of the claim:

[message]

[footer]
SES - Documents Sharing - Claim Rejection to Claimer
This email is sent to the claimer when site admin rejects the claim request of document.
Site owner has rejected your claim request for the document.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message for rejection of the claim:

[message]

[footer]

SES - Document Sharing - New Document and waiting for approval notification
This email will be sent to the admin for approving new Document on the website.
[sender_title] has create a new Document and is waiting for approval.

[header]

Congratulations, [sender_title] has created a new Document on your website. Please take action to approve or disapprove that:

http://[host][object_link]


To visit the Document, click here: http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
SES - Document Sharing - Document sent for Approval
This email will be sent to member when their Document is sent to admin for approval.
Document has been sent for approval

[header]

Your Document '[document_title]' has been sent to administrator for its approval. You will be notified with its status (approved / disapproved) when admin take any action on it.

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
SES - Document Sharing - Document is Approved
This email will be sent to member when their Document gets approved.
Congratulations your Document has been approved.

[header]

Congratulations '[documentowner_title]'!!! Your Document '[document_title]' has been approved by the administrator. Click on the following link to view your Document:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
SES - Document Sharing - Document is Disapproved
This email will be sent to member when their Document gets disapproved.

[header]

Sorry '[documentowner_title]'!!! Your Document '[document_title]' has been disapproved by the administrator.

http://[host][object_link]
